In a statement posted at the center of Chrysler's home page Saturday, Sergio Marchionne said he regrets a term he used and considers it`` inappropriate.'' Yesterday, in responding to a question about Chrysler's government loans, I used a term in reference to the interest rate being charged on our government loans that has raised concern, Sergio Marchionne 's statement said.`` I regret the remark, which I consider inappropriate.'' Sergio Marchionne said Chrysler remains grateful for the bailouts and noted that no other parties were willing to assist in Chrysler's recovery.
